menu.name: Curry Chicken Ramen
menu.description: Roasted chicken, fried onion, cabbage, scallion, and marinated egg with curry broth.
menu.ingredients: chicken, onion, cabbage, scallion, egg, curry broth, peppers

menu.name: Margherita Pizza
menu.description: Flavourful Neapolitan pizza with tasteful toppings representing the Italian flag.
menu.ingredients: dough, tomatoes, mozzarella, basil, virgin olive oil

menu.name: Couscous Salad
menu.description: Fresh and refreshing mediterranean salad for the mind and body.
menu.ingredients: Couscous, olive oil, lemon, bell peppers, cucumber, red onion, parsley, mint

menu.name: Spicy Tuna Sushi
menu.description: Makizushi roll that contains fresh raw tuna, and a spicy twist of mayo and sriracha.
menu.ingredients: tuna, mayo, sriracha, rise, seaweed, avocado
